abstract: United Methodist Church removes five Israeli banks from its investment portfolio over human rights issues.
lead_paragraph: The United Methodist Church has placed five Israeli banks on a list of companies that it will not invest in for human rights reasons.

headline.main: U.S. Church Puts 5 Banks From Israel on a Blacklist
headline.print_headline: U.S. Church Puts 5 Banks From Israel on a Blacklist

snippet: The United Methodist Church has placed five Israeli banks on a list of companies that it will not invest in for human rights reasons.

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
